text: Catch That Kid! is a 2004 American criminal comedy movie. It was directed by Bart Freundlich. It is a remake of the Danish movie Klatret√∏sen (2002). The movie's working titles were Mission Without Permission (also the movie's United Kingdom title) and Catch That Girl. == Release dates== Country Premiere 6 February 2004 2 April 2004 8 April 2004 23 April 2004 14 May 2004 10 June 2004 18 June 2004 22 July 2004 23 July 2004 4 August 2004 5 August 2004 21 October 2004 17 November 2004 24 November 2004 Category:2004 comedy movies Category:2004 crime movies Category:2000s family movies Category:2000s criminal comedy movies Category:2000s movie remakes Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:American criminal comedy movies Category:American family movies Category:American heist movies Category:American movie remakes Category:German crime movies Category:German comedy movies Category:German family movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies about families
